v5.0 Change Log:
Added: Support for Android 6.0/6.0.1 Marshmallow. Option to activate or deactivate every single mod. Now activate only those mods that you want and deactivate others. Option to add Contact Avatar on the left of each text message bubble. [Does not works in Group messages yet] [Experimental Feature] Option to activate long press to copy message on text message bubbles. Option to apply Gradient styles at several places. Option to apply Colour on List items in Conversations, Call logs and Contacts list. [Along with support for Gradient style] Option to add refresh button in Theme Store. [Active by default, to change visit Home>Menu>Settings]
Updated: Emoji picker view mods to support changes in new Whatsapp version. Theme Store - Floating action buttons to publish your theme, refresh store. Themes Store name to Theme Store.
Fixed: Message State Indicator Styles Sizes.
Removed: Option to choose Emoji picker icons colour.
